learning_objective: Decompose (break down) the steps needed to solve a problem into a precise sequence of instructions.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is a game developer who has finished coding a simple yet fun platform game using various algorithms and has reached the marketing and publishing phase. They have decided to follow a sequence of actions to ensure their game gets maximum exposure but lacks the skills to arrange such complex task. Please help Alex in arranging following tasks in sequence - QA testing of the game, Press Release, Making a website for the game, Search Engine Optimization, Branding, Setting up the pricing and listing the game on multiple platforms. How should Alex proceed?",
    "Answer1": "QA testing of the game -> Branding -> Making a website for the game -> Press Release -> Search Engine Optimization -> Setting up the pricing -> Listing the game on multiple platforms",
    "Answer2": "QA testing of the game -> Making a website for the game -> Branding -> Press Release -> Search Engine Optimization -> Listing the game on multiple platforms -> Setting up the pricing",
    "Answer3": "Branding -> Making a website for the game -> Press Release -> Search Engine Optimization -> QA testing of the game -> Setting up the pricing -> Listing the game on multiple platforms",
    "Answer4": "QA testing of the game -> Search Engine Optimization -> Making a website for the game -> Branding -> Press Release -> Setting up the pricing -> Listing the game on multiple platforms",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "Alex should start with QA testing of the game to ensure it is bug-free. Once the game is tested, the next step is Branding as this will play a key role in marketing and attracting users to the game. Post the Branding, Alex should create a website for the game to showcase the features, graphics and other details about the game. Once the website is ready, a press release should be sent out to create buzz in the market and draw further attention to the game. After the press release, Alex should do Search Engine Optimization for the game's website to increase visibility in search engine results. Once these steps are completed, Alex should finalize the pricing and list the game on multiple platforms for maximum exposure.",
    "code_snippet": "action publishGame()
    output "QA testing of the game"
    output "Branding"
    output "Making a website for the game"
    output "Press Release"
    output "Search Engine Optimization"
    output "Setting up the pricing"
    output "Listing the game on multiple platforms"
end
invoke publishGame()
end"
}
